sql_result.sql: WITH base AS (SELECT score.term, score.score_value FROM class JOIN student ON class.id = student.class_id JOIN enroll ON student.id = enroll.student_id JOIN course_class ON enroll.course_class_id = course_class.id JOIN score ON enroll.course_class_id = score.course_class_id WHERE class.grade_year = 2022 AND class.class_name = '2022级计算机科学与技术1班' AND class.is_deleted = 0 AND student.is_deleted = 0 AND enroll.status = '已选' AND enroll.is_deleted = 0 AND course_class.is_deleted = 0 AND score.is_deleted = 0) SELECT base.term, AVG(base.score_value) AS avg_score_value FROM base GROUP BY base.term ORDER BY base.term

entity_mappings.reason: 根据字段描述“年级/入学年份（如 2022 级）”及 probe_samples 中 class.grade_year 候选值 ['2022', '2024', '2023', '2025']，'22级' 对应真实值 '2022'
根据 probe_samples 中 class.class_name 候选值 ['2022级计算机科学与技术1班', ...]，'计科一班' 是 '计算机科学与技术1班' 的常见简称，且唯一匹配到 '2022级计算机科学与技术1班'（年级+专业+序号一致），故归一化为该精确值

output.executed_sql: WITH base AS (SELECT score.term, score.score_value FROM class JOIN student ON class.id = student.class_id JOIN enroll ON student.id = enroll.student_id JOIN course_class ON enroll.course_class_id = course_class.id JOIN score ON enroll.course_class_id = score.course_class_id WHERE class.grade_year = 2022 AND class.class_name = '2022级计算机科学与技术1班' AND class.is_deleted = 0 AND student.is_deleted = 0 AND enroll.status = '已选' AND enroll.is_deleted = 0 AND course_class.is_deleted = 0 AND score.is_deleted = 0) SELECT base.term, AVG(base.score_value) AS avg_score_value FROM base GROUP BY base.term ORDER BY base.term
